line_en_US: Is this how it goes? Maybe like this?
Oh, it worked! I’m Fairy, do you know who you are?
Well it’s a pleasure to meet you SRU.. 2?
That’s kind of a mouthful, if you don’t mind I’m just gonna call you, umm... Esaru.. Seru… Seru!
Perfect! All this flying is making me tired, let me just ride on you like this.
Hmm... I think I’ve done enough exploring for today, so let's just get out of here.
And umm, well I’m kinda lost myself hehe, so I’ll leave the navigating to you!
Brrzt... I will do my best.
